data.eml:eml: New species of Metatrichia Coquillett (Diptera: Scenopinidae) from Australia and Venezuela

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Winterton, Shaun L., Woodley, Norman E. (2009): New species of Metatrichia Coquillett (Diptera: Scenopinidae) from Australia and Venezuela. Zootaxa 2094: 42-51, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.187576
